comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: wiki uses this photo of him en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_II_of_Greece future king George II, King of the Hellenes (Greek: Γεώργιος Βʹ, Βασιλεὺς τῶν Ἑλλήνων, Geórgios Βʹ, Vasiléfs ton Ellínon; 20 July 1890 – 1 April 1947) ruled Greece from 1922 to 1924 and from 1935 to 1947.
